description:
FromFriends™ Project Proposal

Name

FromFriends™

Email or Contact Method

heyfromfriends@gmail.com

Geographic Location

Germany

Applying As

Individual

Name of Project or Idea

Tezos Art 24/7 Live Stream on YouTube, Twitch and TwitterX Live

Detailed Description

Art on Tezos is fascinating, but too often it stays hidden within the Tezos bubble. How can we bring it to a wider audience and attract new collectors?

Introducing Tezos Art 24/7, a 24/7 live stream of new mints and listings on Objkt.com, broadcasting directly to YouTube, Twitch, and X. Most smart TVs, TV sticks, and media boxes come with these apps preinstalled, providing instant, low-friction access to Tezos art on the big screen.

By live streaming Tezos digital art 24/7 on these platforms, we:

  • Drive more traffic and sales to Objkt.com
  • Give artists greater exposure
  • Introduce new collectors and creators from other platforms
  • Inspire people with new pieces to collect
  • Reinforce Tezos as a thriving, active NFT ecosystem

Tezos Art 24/7 isn’t just a feed — it is a living window into the world of Tezos NFTs, keeping the community vibrant and visible around the clock.

Background and Experience

I’m a creative developer focused on building innovative platforms that empower artists and collectors in the Web3 ecosystem through thoughtful design and technology.

I’ve built several digital art related projects using the Objkt.com v3 and tzkt.io APIs. These include tools for EditArt, Objkt.com, fx(hash) Tezos, and Bootloader.art. Explore all my projects here: https://from-friends.github.io/

In 2025, I won five Tezos Developer Awards for these projects. Together with my teammate Bruno Formagio, we won both “Best Overall” and “Collab Culture” at the official 2025 Etherlink Hackathon for our fully on-chain generative art platform, Permalink.

Social Handles

X: @FromFriends__

Funding Amount Requested

3850 XTZ (~$2,500 USD at ~$0.65 per token at the time of writing) Around 1/4 of it goes to server and service costs.

Tez Address to Be Funded

fromfriends.tez tz1U49JkLGSUR7JFN5xFoFghNwMXnQtR7Pv5

Proposed Goals / GPIs and Deliverables

Deliverables

  • Live feed page hosted on the VPS to be streamed to platforms – Prototype Demo: https://from-friends.github.io/tezos-art-live-stream.html (optimized for landscape mode, e.g. 16:9) – Support for images, video, and animated GIF – > NSFW filter to comply with the platforms’ terms of service
  • 24/7 Tezos art live stream on YouTube, Twitch, and X (formerly Twitter) for one year
  • Landing page to promote the live stream – Links to livestreams – Embed live stream tutorial – Information about digital art on Tezos
  • VPS setup
  • Restream setup
  • Setup social media accounts and streams for YouTube, Twitch, and TwitterX Live
  • Maintenance and monitoring of server, streams, and social media profiles

Live Stream Duration

24/7 for 1 year

GPIs

  • Live stream viewers
  • Total stream views
  • QR codes scanned and traffic driven to Objkt.com
  • Live stream and server uptime
name: Tezos Art 24/7 Live Stream on YouTube, Twitch and TwitterX
author: tz1gUz4TMkJxe6fWHcaGgzWUWeF5ad8B6pXv
